mapper.insert: insert into t_child (parent_id, child_name, child_birthdate, child_gender, child_notes, child_behavior) values (#{parentId}, #{childName}, #{childBirthdate}, #{childGender}, #{childNotes}, #{childBehavior})
mapper.select: SELECT child_name AS childName, child_birthdate AS childBirthdate, child_gender AS childGender FROM t_child WHERE parent_id = #{parentId}
